sen.j: 岩倉 具賢（いわくら ともかた、享和2年（1802年） - 文政元年5月22日 (旧暦)（1818年6月25日））は、江戸時代後期の廷臣。
sen.e: Tomokata IWAKURA (1802 - June 25, 1818) was a retainer of Imperial Court in the latter period of the Edo period.
Tomokata IWAKURA (1802 - June 25, 1818) was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the latter period of the Edo period.
Tomokata IWAKURA (1802 - June 25, 1818) was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the late Edo period.
sen.cmt: late Edo period と表現を他記事と統一しました。

sen.e: His biological father was Sadashige IMAKI.
His biological father was Sadashige IMAKI.
His biological father was Sadashige IMAKI.
His mother was a daughter of Naruchika NAKAYAMA.
His mother was the daughter of Naruchika NAKAYAMA.
His mother was the daughter of Naruchika NAKAYAMA.
His adoptive father was Tomoai IWAKURA.
His adoptive father was Tomoai IWAKURA.
His adoptive father was Tomoai IWAKURA.

sen.j: 義理の弟で養子に岩倉具慶（明治維新の功臣岩倉具視の養父）。
sen.e: As half-brother and as adopted child, he had Tomoyoshi IWAKURA (adoptive father of Tomomi IWAKURA, a meritorious vassal in the Meiji Restoration).
As half-brother and as an adopted child, he had Tomoyoshi IWAKURA (adoptive father of Tomomi IWAKURA, a meritorious vassal during the Meiji Restoration).
As half-brother and as an adopted child, he had Tomoyoshi IWAKURA (adoptive father of Tomomi IWAKURA, a meritorious vassal during the Meiji Restoration).
His final court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His final court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His final court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 公家岩倉家の嫡男であり、五位に叙爵もしていたが、17歳のとき父に先立って夭折した。
sen.e: He was the legitimate son of a Court noble family, Iwakura family, and also was conferred a peerage as Fifth Rank, but died when he was 17, before his father did.
He was the legitimate son of a Court noble family, the Iwakura family, and also was conferred a peerage as Fifth Rank, but died when he was seventeen, before his father did.
He was the legitimate son of a court noble family, the Iwakura family, and also was conferred peerage as Goi (Fifth Rank), but died when he was 17, before his father did.
sen.cmt: 17をアラビア数字にしました。

sen.j: 岩倉具集の跡は大原家から養子に入った岩倉具慶が具賢の養子として継いでいる。
sen.e: As the successor of Tomoai IWAKURA, Tomoyoshi IWAKURA, being adopted from the Ohara family as a child of Tomokata, inherited the family.
As the successor of Tomoai IWAKURA, Tomoyoshi IWAKURA, being adopted from the Ohara family as a child of Tomokata, inherited the family.
As the successor of Tomoai IWAKURA, Tomoyoshi IWAKURA, being adopted from the Ohara family as a child of Tomokata, inherited the family.
